It was only a five day dose, but I feel like I've had the flu for a week.  Sore throat, puffy eyes, no energy. I finished the dose and the swelling is still there in my thumb and very painful.  I'm not happy with anything at this point, but I'm sorry I let this stuff into my system.  Not good!!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This is the 2nd time for me on this med in less than 2 months for treatment of asthma. The 1st time I took this I had no side effects at all. Now, on day one of the multi pack I have had nausea, vomiting, headache, face and chest flushing, and sleeplessness. But I will continue to take it because I am no longer wheezing and only having to use my nebulizer 2 x a day and inhaler 2 x a day!

column2: 25-34 Female  (Patient)
column9: Doctor recommended methylpred for my 7 year old. 4mg. She took the 6 pills the first day and had trouble sleeping. medication warns about insomia, so I was patient and continued the second day with the 5 pills. At night my daughter woke up crying and having muscle spasm and bone pain. Uncontrolled movements of the lower body and made her scared and miserable. This medicine slows growth in children. I am having a hard time accepting the fact that the doctor gave this medicine to a 7 year old to treat cough. I am not using the rest of it. Called the doctor she said stop using it. 44mg are already in my child's system. Horrible experience for my daughter.
